title: Minecraft Classic Released
trivia: Markus Persson made Minecraft publicly available in its Classic phase, laying the foundation for the game's future.

title: Minecraft Alpha Debuts
trivia: The Alpha stage introduced survival elements and frequent updates that rapidly expanded Minecraft's scope.

title: Minecraft Beta Begins
trivia: Beta 1.0 marked the start of paid access and ongoing feature-rich updates to Minecraft.

title: Minecraft 1.0 Launch
trivia: Official release during MineCon 2011 delivered The End dimension and the Ender Dragon boss.

title: Jungle Biomes Arrive
trivia: Minecraft 1.2.1 added jungle biomes, ocelots, and height doubled to 256 blocks.

title: The Horse Update
trivia: Minecraft 1.6 introduced horses, carpets, and resource packs, revolutionizing traversal and customization.

title: The Bountiful Update
trivia: Version 1.8 revamped ocean monuments, added rabbits, and introduced new commands and blocks.

title: Combat Update Released
trivia: Minecraft 1.9 added elytra wings, shields, and sweeping changes to combat timing.

title: World of Color Update
trivia: Minecraft 1.12 refreshed the palette with vibrant blocks and the advancement system.

title: Village & Pillage Update
trivia: Version 1.14 redesigned villages, added pillagers, and introduced scaffolding and many new blocks.

title: Buzzy Bees Update
trivia: Minecraft 1.15 brought bees, honey blocks, and performance optimizations.

title: Nether Update Released
trivia: Version 1.16 overhauled the Nether with new biomes, blocks, and the piglin civilization.

title: Caves & Cliffs Part II
trivia: Minecraft 1.18 reimagined world generation with massive mountains and deep caves.

title: The Wild Update
trivia: Version 1.19 introduced the Deep Dark, mangrove swamps, and the Warden boss.

title: Trails & Tales Update
trivia: Minecraft 1.20 added archaeology, cherry groves, and new camel mounts for exploration.
